EmailTemplate.description: Notification to requestor that the form has been rejected.
EmailTemplate.name: Form Request Rejected Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Sandbox Request Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Approval_Requesting_User.Name},
The Form {!Forms__c.Form_Type__c} {!Forms__c.Name__c} has been rejected.
{!Forms__c.Link}
Thank you.
